actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 34, title 38, United States Code, to extend the time limitation for completing a program of education.

summary.text: Extends a veteran's time limitation for completing a program of education and remaining eligible for financial assistance from 8 years to 14 years after release from active duty. (Amends 38 U.S.C. l662(a), (b), (c))

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 34, title 38, United States Code, to extend the time limitation for completing a program of education.
